faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Find answers to the most frequently asked questions about Dimension-X.

whatIsDimensionX.question: What is Dimension-X?
whatIsDimensionX.answer: Dimension-X is a game where magic and technology collide, offering players a unique multiverse experience.

howToStart.question: How do I start playing?
howToStart.answer: The game is now public with limited functionality! To play your first campaign, register on the site and reach out to a game master through our Discord. Check our Newcomer's Guide for detailed information on getting started and our Player Cheat Sheet for quick reference during gameplay. You can also interact with our AI assistant or contact the creator directly for help.

canSwitchDimensions.question: Can I switch dimensions?
canSwitchDimensions.answer: Yes! Dimension switching is a core feature of the game, allowing players to explore different dimensions with varying effects on gameplay. Each dimension has unique properties that affect your character's abilities and resources.

whoDeveloping.question: Who is developing Dimension-X?
whoDeveloping.answer: Dimension-X is being developed by a single person who is passionate about creating immersive game experiences.

whenAvailable.question: When will Dimension-X be available?
whenAvailable.answer: Dimension-X is now available with limited functionality! We're in an early access phase where players can join campaigns led by game masters. We're continuously adding new features and expanding the game. Stay updated on our progress by subscribing to our newsletter or following us on social media.

provideFeedback.question: Can I provide feedback or suggestions?
provideFeedback.answer: Yes, we welcome your feedback and suggestions. Please use the contact form on our website to reach out to the creator.

stayUpdated.question: Is there a way to stay updated on the game's progress?
stayUpdated.answer: Absolutely! You can subscribe to our newsletter or follow us on social media for the latest updates and news about Dimension-X.

betaTesting.question: Is the game in beta testing?
betaTesting.answer: Yes, we're currently in an early access phase! Players can already join campaigns and experience the core gameplay. This phase helps us gather feedback and improve the game. If you're playing now, you're already part of our testing community - thank you for your support!

platforms.question: What platforms is Dimension-X available on?
platforms.answer: Dimension-X is currently available on PC through our web platform. We're focusing on providing the best experience on this platform before considering expansions to other platforms in the future.

supportDevelopment.question: How can I support the development of Dimension-X?
supportDevelopment.answer: The best way to support us now is by playing the game, providing feedback on your experience, and reporting any issues you encounter. You can also help by inviting friends to join campaigns, sharing your gameplay experiences on social media, and engaging with our community on Discord. Your participation during this early access phase is invaluable to our development process!

steps.step2: Connect our Discord and reach any of game masters so that add you to a campaign

infoList.item1: Learn backstory (optional) - use Discord or chat with AI to understand lore and main game rules
infoList.item2: The game is divided by cycles where each cycle is a turn
infoList.item3: The character have characteristics and attributes
infoList.item4: The characteristics influence any action and attributes of your character
infoList.item5: On any action the dice been thrown and the result influenced by number of the dice result
infoList.item6: To perform actions you spend ActionPoints and Flow or Stamina depends on your path
infoList.item7: In general by the cycle you can make an action, use item, move, do dialog, act - acting and dialog is not taken the action points but moderated by GM
infoList.item8: Please find the order of your character by check your speed - in case you have same speed with other characters it's best to roll the dice to find who is faster

scheduled.title: Scheduled Actions
scheduled.description: Ordered and executed on turn end (attack, defense)

itemsCartography.title: Items & Cartography:
itemsCartography.description: Some items give you great advantage like cartograph that allow you and your guild draw the map and use it. It's better to communicate with person who have cartograph and report to him your position as it will not automatically mapped.

deathSystem.title: Death System:
deathSystem.description: When you die you not actually died unless you don't have status death mark or through death, this is dimensional curse that would kill and wipe your character from the world. In other cases you would be respawned in safe place with penalties statuses coma.

teamPlay.title: Team Play:
teamPlay.description: The first status is knocked out and you can been rescued by your team mates in this status.

npcs.title: NPCs:
npcs.description: Not all NPC aggressive by default but you and your team mate could make guild aggressive against your guild so be cautious.

rolePlaying.title: Role Playing:
rolePlaying.description: Don't forget to act when you performing something or want to participate in something - it's role play all in all.

turnTime.title: Turn Time:
turnTime.description: Don't over act or make 5 minutes turns - you are not alone here!
